title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy view does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc to a field in the Type Hierarchy view, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not have any effect. The expected behavior is for the action to add Javadoc to the selected field.
OB: From the context menu, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option on a field in the Type Hierarchy view does not have any effect.
EB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, Javadoc should be added to the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view
2. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view
